tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE distances_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY, point_1 GEOMETRY, point_2 GEOMETRY)
CREATE TABLE locations_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name VARCHAR(255), location_point GEOMETRY)
CREATE TABLE calculations_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY, distance FLOAT, location_1_id INT, location_2_id INT)

CREATE TABLE geolocation_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
)
